name: a puzzle game...
description: a puzzle game... is a free-to-play platformer game where you jump on platforms and reach the end to progress further in the game. It was developed and maintained by HistorVical. The game's graphics are basic shapes. It revolves around parkour and adventure elements. I am idiot, idk how to make games sorry. A total of 5 levels give you more than 5 minutes of fun. This game was made in 2 days using the Unity Game Engine.
